DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility of aspiration samples for mutational analysis in patients with a non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of Mutational Analysis of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Using Low-volume Lung Aspirates
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will compare results of mutational analysis from a core needle biopsy and fine needle aspiration.
DOC.criteria: primary tumor or a metastatic lung lesion requested for mutational analysis a) lesions located adjacent to the large central bronchi or vessels b) peribronchovascular lesions with prominent internal CT airbronchograms, which were considered difficult to be avoided by needle pass c) lesions in patient with severe respiratory compromise
